title: Alpha Client Sound Feedback
body: In the Alpha Client there's a lot of new sliders which offers more control, and I love that. However, an issue I have is that the SFX audio slider does not affect the sound a champion makes when picked so it's very loud compared to the rest of the sound. Muting the client isn't really an option either because then I miss when it's my turn to pick/ban. Fixing this would be great :)

replies.body: Yeah, a couple of audio fixes are coming out with the next patch.

More audio options were added. http://prntscr.com/d987tt
Should fix the current audio problems in champion select.
Awesome, yeah it will fix the issue. Any idea on when these changes will go live?
